name: Long-acting insulin analogues (KTT12)
title: KTT12: Type 2 diabetes mellitus - Long-acting insulin analogues
description: Number of prescription items for long-acting human
analogue insulins as a percentage of the total number
of prescription items for all long-acting and
intermediate acting insulins excluding biphasic insulins.
denominator_where: ((bnf_code LIKE '0601012Z0%%')  OR (bnf_code LIKE '0601012X0%%')  OR (bnf_code LIKE '0601012V0%%')  OR (bnf_code LIKE '0601012G0%%')  OR (bnf_code LIKE '0601012L0%%')  OR (bnf_code LIKE '0601012N0%%')  OR (bnf_code LIKE '0601012S0%%')  OR (bnf_code LIKE '060101200%%')  OR (bnf_code LIKE '0601012U0%%'))  AND (bnf_code NOT LIKE '0601012C0%%')  AND (bnf_code NOT LIKE '0601012F0%%')  AND (bnf_code NOT LIKE '0601012D0%%')  AND (bnf_code NOT LIKE '0601012W0%%')  AND (practice_id=%s)  AND (processing_date=%s)
